      • automaticTranslationCall

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Call automaticTranslationCall​(String text,
                                                         String sourceLanguage,
                                                         String targetLanguage,
                                                         String providers,
                                                         ProgressResponseBody.ProgressListener progressListener,
                                                         ProgressRequestBody.ProgressRequestListener progressRequestListener)
                                                  throws ApiException
        Build call for automaticTranslation
        Parameters:
        text - Text to translate (required)
        sourceLanguage - Language code of text (ex: fr (French), en (English), es (Spanish)) (required)
        targetLanguage - Language code of text (ex: fr (French), en (English), es (Spanish)) (required)
        providers - Provider to compare (ex: [ 'amazon', 'microsoft', 'ibm', 'google']) (required)
        progressListener - Progress listener
        progressRequestListener - Progress request listener
        Returns:
        Call to execute
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to serialize the request body object

      • automaticTranslation

        public InlineResponse2009 automaticTranslation​(String text,
                                               String sourceLanguage,
                                               String targetLanguage,
                                               String providers)
                                        throws ApiException
        Machine translation refers to the translation of a text into another language using rules, statics or ml technics. **SUPPORTED LANGUAGE** |Name|Type|Value| |----|----|-----| |**Afrikaans**|`string`|`af-AF`| |**Albanian**|`string`|`sq-SQ`| |**Amharic**|`string`|`am-AM`| |**Arabic**|`string`|`ar-XA`| |**Armenian**|`string`|`hy-HY`| |**Azerbaijani**|`string`|`az-AZ`| |**Basque**|`string`|`eu-BA`| |**Belarusian**|`string`|`be-BE`| |**Bengali**|`string`|`bn-BN`| |**Bosnian**|`string`|`bs-BS`| |**Bulgarian**|`string`|`bg-BG`| |**Catalan**|`string`|`ca-ES`| |**Cebuano**|`string`|`ceb-CB`| |**Chinese-Simplified**|`string`|`zh-CN`| |**Chinese-Traditional**|`string`|`zh-TW`| |**Corsican**|`string`|`co-CO`| |**Croatian**|`string`|`hr-HR`| |**Czech**|`string`|`cz-CZ`| |**Danish**|`string`|`da-DK`| |**Dutch**|`string`|`nl-NL`| |**English**|`string`|`en-US`| |**Esperanto**|`string`|`eo-EO`| |**Estonian**|`string`|`et-ET`| |**Persian**|`string`|`fa-FA`| |**Polish**|`string`|`pl-PO`| |**Portuguese**|`string`|`pt-PT`| |**Punjabi**|`string`|`pa-PA`| |**Romanian**|`string`|`ro-RO`| |**Russian**|`string`|`ru-RU`| |**Welsh**|`string`|`cy-CY`| |**Xhosa**|`string`|`xh-XH`| |**Yiddish**|`string`|`yi-YI`| |**Yoruba**|`string`|`yo-YO`| **AVAILABLE PROVIDERS** |Name|Value|Version| |----|-----|-------| |**Microsoft         targetLanguage - Language code of text (ex: fr (French), en (English), es (Spanish)) (required)
        providers - Provider to compare (ex: [ 'amazon', 'microsoft', 'ibm', 'google']) (required)

        public ApiResponse<InlineResponse20010> languageDetectionWithHttpInfo​(String text,
                                                                      String providers)
                                                               throws ApiException
        Language Detection or language guessing is the algorithm of determining which natural language given content is in. **AVAILABLE PROVIDERS** |Name|Value|Version| |----|-----|-------| |**Microsoft Azure**|`microsoft`| `v3.1` |**Amazon Web Services**|`amazon`| `boto3 (v1.15.18)` |**Google Cloud**|`google`| `v1`

        providers - Provider to compare (ex: [ 'amazon', 'microsoft', 'ibm','google']) (required)
        Returns:
        ApiResponse<InlineResponse20010>
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • languageDetectionAsync

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Call languageDetectionAsync​(String text,
                                                       String providers,
                                                       ApiCallback<InlineResponse20010> callback)
                                                throws ApiException
        (asynchronously) Language Detection or language guessing is the algorithm of determining which natural language given content is in. **AVAILABLE PROVIDERS** |Name|Value|Version| |----|-----|-------| |**Microsoft Azure**|`microsoft`| `v3.1` |**Amazon Web Services**|`amazon`| `boto3 (v1.15.18)` |**Google Cloud**|`google`| `v1`
        Parameters:
        text - Text to analyze (required)
        providers - Provider to compare (ex: [ 'amazon', 'microsoft', 'ibm','google']) (required)
        callback - The callback to be executed when the API call finishes
        Returns:
        The request call
        Throws:
